title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Pediatric Patient Safety Simulation Game-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply pediatric patient safety protocols according to International Patient Safety Goals (IPSG) standards with ≥85% accuracy.
Learners can replicate 7 essential safety action procedures for pediatric emergency scenarios in a simulated environment through game-based quizzes.
By completing 102 game quests, learners can identify and correct ≥90% of pediatric patient safety error cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
